law.catch_line: Waiver Of Secs. 2 To 4; Payee Penalty For Failure To Transfer

text.section: The provisions of sections 2 to 4, inclusive, shall not be waived.

No payee who proposes to make a transfer of structured settlement payment rights shall incur a penalty, forfeit an application fee or other payment, or otherwise incur any liability to the proposed transferee based on the failure of the transfer to satisfy the conditions of section 2.
